definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: They cant change a light bulb or without making a sketch.
sentences.chinese: 他们连灯泡都不会换，或者至少要先画个草图。

sentences.english: Based on randomizing techniques, this paper discussed how the sketch-based approach estimates approximate answers to aggregate queries.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了基于草图的复杂聚集查询的近似处理算法。

sentences.english: I still use sketching to try out different elements of look and feel.
sentences.chinese: 我还在用草图来试验视觉效果方面的不同元素。

sentences.english: Her craftsmanship improved and she mastered her sketching techniques.
sentences.chinese: 她的手艺提高了，还熟练地掌握了草图素描法。

sentences.english: Will you draw us an outline map of your province?
sentences.chinese: 你给我们画张你们省的草图好吗？

sentences.english: They roughed out the city plan.
sentences.chinese: 他们画出了城市规划的草图。

sentences.english: Instead, I worked out details and form through sketching and massing.
sentences.chinese: 我通过画草图和建草模来解决细节和形式的问题。

sentences.english: Our initial studies were done with simple sketched icons in black-and-white ink on paper.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用画在纸上的简单黑白草图进行最初的研究。

sentences.english: Select the right-most line of the sketch.
sentences.chinese: 选取草图的最右侧直线。

sentences.english: Modify the payment sketch by adding the credit card option.
sentences.chinese: 通过添加信用卡选项来编辑支付草图。

sentences.english: This drawing shows what the house will look like when it is built.
sentences.chinese: 这张草图展示了这幢房子建成后的外观。

sentences.english: An illustration or a logo is likely to need more sketching than a website.
sentences.chinese: 草图在设计插画和标志时的使用频率就比网站大的多。

sentences.english: Using the sketch, it is now possible to tabulate the coordinates of all the nodes .
sentences.chinese: 应用草图，现在可以将所有结点的坐标移制成表。

sentences.english: He drafted the model of the atomic warhead.
sentences.chinese: 他画了原子弹头模型的草图。

sentences.english: Making some sketches and color simulation, the customer gave a go signal to start the project.
sentences.chinese: 顾客在看完草图及色样后，同意开始对汽车进行喷绘。

sentences.english: The draughtsman rapidly blocked in his idea .
sentences.chinese: 制图员很快地把他的构思画成草图。

definition: a plan/a planar graph/a plane figure
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
to make a draft/to draft (a document)
to draw designs, maps etc/picture (e.g. of life in the city)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
